original_text:
“‘Your mother was like a vine in your vineyard
    planted by the water;
it was fruitful and full of branches
    because of abundant water.
korean_text: 네 피의 어머니는 물 가에 심겨진 포도나무 같아서 물이 많으므로 열매가 많고 가지가 무성하며

sentences.original_text: Your mother was like a vine in your vineyard
sentences.korean_translation: 어머니는 네 포도원에 있는 포도나무와 같았다

sentences.original_text: it was fruitful and full of branches
